We refer to Wikipedia articles on video editing for help. To prioritize an external microphone over the internal mic, the sound settings need to be configured accordingly. In this case, the correct option would be to set the sound recording to manual and lower the recording level of the internal microphone, so that it is not competing with the external microphone.

The answer is: A: A small focus box appears on live view that can be moved to focus on different areas or follow a moving subject.

Explanation: In the video, the speaker mentions that in autofocus mode 6, a small focus box appears on the live view screen that can be moved around to focus on different parts of the scene or followed as the subject moves. This indicates that precise focusing is achieved through the use of this small focus box.
